dataList.content: There appear to be no more signs of the ex-soldiers from this point onward.
The commander did warn us not to go further…
As we proceeded, we discovered bodies that seemed to have been there for quite some time.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: These are our… no, L Corp’s employees…
I see traces of blunt instruments. All the bodies share them, in fact.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: A management report… This document contains instructions for keeping Abnormalities in check.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Normally, employees tasked with catering to Abnormalities memorize the instructions to the point of reciting them flawlessly… They don’t usually carry notes like these.
I dare suspect that no remaining employees had the necessary information when an Abnormality breached…
…Hmh.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: If the eggs weren’t moved into containment yet… that could be the case.
<There are way too many corpses here.>
What kind of Abnormality could have massacred all these employees―
Wait… What’s this smell?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: …You see, our Office purchased an expensive device the other day.
What’re you on about?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Sources suggested that toxin levels started to rise after a certain floor.
Uh, I’ve been bleeding from my ears a bit~ Is this okay?
No battle is without adversi― Pfehgh, gahf! Khoff!

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I was told that continued exposure to it may cause bleeding, like that.
Nhg… How are you so fine, though?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: This is… It’s the anti-Abnormality gas grenade supplied to employees.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: One must’ve… Cough… Gone off… Somewhere between the bodies here…

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: True, the toxicity levels do appear to be intense around this area.
Hopkins had put on a gas mask before we noticed.
Hey now, what about us?
We weren’t granted any additional supplies.
You slippery rat, you knew all this time? You’re not getting away with… Ngh…
Heathcliff stopped mid-sentence and fell to one knee.
Your blood flow will quicken if you’re agitated. In other words, the toxin will spread faster.
Try to remain calm, minimize movement, and breathe at regular intervals.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Hopkins… Why… Cough. Why didn’t you tell me about this?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Oh, I’ve got a question for you too, Yuri.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Why would I make our Office waste our precious funds on expensive gadgets for dead weight like you to use?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: If we’re being real, it’s a miracle that you managed to join us in the first place.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Maybe Aya took pity and gave you special treatment… but she’s gone now, so who cares?
Sneaky blighter… Is that how you want to live…

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Don’t be silly, everything’s fair game for a Fixer.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Hearing that the Red Gaze had company tickled my curiosity, but as it turns out…

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: You were just a bunch of ragtag lunatics who thought it’d be a good idea to walk straight into these facilities with zero prep.
What a sick joke… Can’t do anything but watch…
Feeling the ire towards him, Hopkins backed away and scurried to the exit.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Well, at least I managed to grab an armful of Enkephalin thanks to you.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I’ll write in my report that you all went missing, ‘cause “suffocated to death” is just too embarrassing.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Ta-ta.
Yuri slumped to the floor, watching blood pour from her nose to her hands.
And she’s not the only one. Rodya, Heathcliff, and the other Sinners are suffering from blood loss too.
<Gregor?>
Tsk, I took this with me so you could have something to remember her by…
He was holding the same type of gas mask as the one Hopkins wore.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: But why…
Heard Aya—cough—gave you special treatment, didn’t she…? This is as good as yours then.
As for our unprepared band of lunatics… we do have a way out. Don’t worry about us.
Coughing up blood, Yuri put on the mask.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: …I know he’s right.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I know earning recognition from an Office of strangers is a hard thing to do, even if I take on all kinds of errands day and night.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: There were only 3 minutes left until the branch was locked down…

dataList.title: L Corp.
dataList.content: [INITIATING SITE BURIAL.]

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: The doors were about to close on me.

dataList.title: L Corp.
dataList.content: [ENERGY TRANSFER IS 85% COMPLETE.]

dataList.title: L Corp. Employee
dataList.content: Yuri, don’t leave me behind! Yuri!

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: So what else am I supposed to do?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Is it so wrong that I survived?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Should I have been buried alive alongside my coworkers?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: When the whole building was going under, all so the Abnormalities won’t escape?
Khoff… It is a sin. At least down here.
Kahoff, kahf. That stings a little, Gregor…
Standing astounded, I snapped back to reality and checked on the Sinners.
Half of them had already passed away on the floor, and Ishmael’s head drooped just after she said her last words.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: A sin…
But, pah… So what, buddy…
You’ve got to live on like it’s nobody’s business.
Cough. Laying guilt on yourself over spilt milk… will wear your heart out…
With Gregor drawing his last breath, Yuri and I became the only surviving members standing in the area.
<Uhm… D-Don’t worry too much about us. I can take them back there and revive them.>
I knew mechanical ticking was all Yuri could hear, but I did my best to communicate my message to her nonetheless.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: …I know.
Yuri ended the conversation with not a word after.
After a long period of awkward gloom, the toxic gas finally dispersed.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: …Looks like it’s okay now.
<Hmm? Oh, yeah.>

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I’ll give you a hand. Let’s go bring your people back to life.
Saying that, Yuri took the gas mask off and calmly carried the Sinners on her shoulders, one by one.
Unsure what to say for her, I remained quiet.
